title: Chapter 2549 - 2549 Chapter 2548-Xie Nianqing'S Strength
body:
Chapter 2549 - 2549 Chapter 2548-Xie Nianqing'S Strength

2549 Chapter 2548-Xie nianqing’s strength

In the blink of an eye, another dozen moves had been exchanged.

Bang!

Prison-guarding patriarch’s imprint. couldn’t beat it, and he was sent flying by Saint ancestor bloodheart. His body turned illusory, as if he would fall apart at any moment.

“Not good!”

The heaven realm beings who witnessed all of this had extremely ugly expressions, and they revealed looks of despair.

Could it be that no one could stop the sacred ancestor murderheart? was the heaven realm destined to be defeated and destroyed?

They were unwilling, but their strength was limited.

“Prison-guarding old ghost, completely disappear!”

Saint ancestor bloodheart roared, and his aura grew stronger as he kept attacking prison suppression patriarch.

Bang!

The prison-guarding patriarch was. .h.i.t again. His body almost fell apart, and his breath was weak, The prison-guarding patriarch had no choice but to summon the prison-guarding stele to resist sacred ancestor bloodheart. However, this way, the sky breaking Army would have no opponents.

Roar!

The giant of the sky-breaking Army roared and charged at the prison suppression patriarch.

The seal of the prison-guarding patriarch and the prison-guarding stele combined to resist the giant formed by sacred ancestor bloodheart and the sky-breaking Army, but he was still not their match. He was completely suppressed.

BOOM! BOOM!

The prison-suppressing stele was constantly sent flying and shaking.

Kachaa!

A voice came from the prison-suppressing stele, which shocked everyone.

The prison-suppressing stele could not hold on any longer. A crack appeared on it.

hehe, break! Break! I’ll completely break you!

Saint ancestor bloodheart sneered.

Everyone in the heaven realm had a heavy heart.

“Lu Ming…”

The ancestral Dragon sighed. Lu Ming had not broken through successfully.

“Ancestral Dragon, your defeat is certain!”

The non-human divine ancestor sneered.

Lu Ming was still sitting cross-legged on the peak of the Dragon sovereign peak. The aura on his body was fluctuating as he focused on cultivation.

Suddenly, a shadow flashed in the sky and a figure appeared. It was Xie nianqing.

“Lu Ming, I hope you can make it in time. I will buy you some time!”

Xie nianqing muttered, then turned around and disappeared.

On the battlefield of two world city, sacred ancestor bloodheart and the sky breaking Army worked together. The prison-suppressing stele was. .h.i.t a few more times, and more cracks appeared on it.

The prison-suppressing stele had been damaged and was weaker. It couldn’t withstand the attacks of sacred ancestor bloodheart and the sky breaking Army.

shatter, shatter for me! Prison-guarding old man, I will make the only evidence that you have left in this world disappear!

Saint ancestor bloodheart laughed. His body was covered in blood-red light, which turned into blood-red sword light and kept slashing at the prison-suppressing stele.

At the same time, be controlled the blood bead to burst out with rays of blood light with amazing power. However, at this moment, endless black light suddenly appeared above her head and turned into a huge black Lotus, which pressed down on her,

“You want to attack me? you’re looking for death!”

dic! Saint ancestor bloodhcart shouted. He waved his hand, and a blood-red sword light shot out, hitting the Black Lotus.

BOOM!

With a violent boom, the Black Lotus was sent. Ilying, but it didn’t collapse as Saint ancestor bloodheart had expected.

The Black Lotus flew backward, and in the next moment, a figure appeared on the Lotus.

It was a young woman in a long black dress. She was unparalleled and beautiful.

he blocked it! He actually blocked Saint ancestor bloodheart’s attack!

Many people were shocked.

The sacred ancestor bloodheart was a martial G.o.d. Even a casual strike from him was not something ordinary people could block. Even demiG.o.ds would find it difficult to block.

However, sacred ancestor bloodheart’s attack had been blocked.

“What?”

Saint ancestor bloodheart was also taken aback. A cold light flashed in her eyes, and her blood Qi condensed into a shocking Blood Sword that slashed toward the Black Lotus.

“Scatter!”

With a crisp sound, the Black Lotus flower suddenly spread out into black petals. Each petal turned into a beam of sword Qi, which kept attacking Saint ancestor bloodheart’s Blood Sword.

Buzzzzzz! &Nbsp; Whoosh!…

It was as if divine swords were colliding with each other, and the sound of swords clashing resounded through the earth.

Although the black sword Qi kept shattering, the blood-red sword light. from Saint ancestor bloodheart’s attack weakened a little after each black sword Qi was shattered.

When the last black sword Qi collapsed, sacred ancestor bloodheart’s blood-red sword-light was less than 10% of its original power, and it was easily blocked by the woman.

“I blocked it again!”

“This time, the Saint, ancestor bloodheart is serious!”

Many people were shocked.

Who was this woman? she was so powerful that she could block Saint ancestor bloodheart’s attack,

I know. It’s Xic nianqing, Lu Ming’s wife, Xie nianqing!

“What? Lu Ming’s wife is so powerful!”

Countless people were deeply shocked.

Many people were aware of Lu Ming’s combat strength. He was able to fight against two demiG.o.ds of the non-human race. He was unparalleled and brilliant.

However, his wife was even more terrifying now. She could actually fight with the sacred ancestor

bloodheart. This was too shocking.

“How is that possible? She’s only a demiG.o.d. How could she have blocked sacred ancestor bloodheart’s

attack?

The number one king and the other old Kings were all stunned.

They could tell that Xie nianqing was a demiG.o.d, but his combat power was far above theirs.

That’s right, Xie nianging’s cultivation had reached the demiG.o.d realm.

He had been on and out of the yellow Springs Island for almost 200 years. With the help of the life fruit, Xie nianqing had reached the demiG.o.d realm.

Moreover, Xie nianqing’s combat strength was far beyond ordinary people.

Back then, when Xie nianqing was a five-star heavenly Emperor, he could already suppress a peak heavenly Emperor. Now that he had become a demiG.o.d, his combat strength naturally far exceeded other demiG.o.ds. They weren’t the only ones who were shocked. The non-human divine ancestor and ancestral Dragon were equally shocked.

“She’s actually this strong?”

On the battlefield, Huang Ling and Qiu Yue looked a the magnificent Xic nianqing and sighed.

“Ah, kill, kill, kill!”

Xic nianging had blocked two of Saint ancestor bloodhcart’s moves in a row, which further stimulated his killing intent and ruthlessness.

Ie roared madly and charged towards Xie nianqing, completely ignoring the prison-suppressing stele.

The prison-suppressing stele and the giant of the heaven breaking Army were engaged in a fierce battle.

Bang! Bang!

Xie nianqing exchanged a few more blows with sacred ancestor bloodheart. Although Xie nianging was at a disadvantage and was forced to retreat, he still managed to block sacred ancestor bloodheart’s attack.

Many people exclaimed in admiration!

They knew that Xie nianqing’s battle-power was truly shocking. He had already surpa.s.sed the other demiG.o.ds. Although he wasn’t a match for sacred ancestor bloodheart yet, he could already fight her. Any other demiG.o.d would’ve been instantly killed by sacred ancestor bloodheart.

“Dic!”

Saint ancestor bloodheart went even crazier. He threw the blood-red bead in his hand.

This blood-red bead was a weapon that surpa.s.sed the heaven Dao soldiers. It was controlled by sacred

ancestor bloodheart, and its power was terrifying.

“Break!”

Xie nianqing shouted as she formed a seal with her fingers. Countless Black Lotus flowers appeared around her. These Black Lotus flowers turned into sword lights and slashed at Saint ancestor bloodhcart.

23
